steps.title: Step 1
steps.teacher_activity:
- Asks each learner to list at least three names of trees in his/her community
- The teacher writes the list of trees generated from learners’ lists on the chalk board and asks them to write the list in their books
steps.student_activity:
- Each learner notes down at least three names of trees in his/her community
- Write the list of trees in their communities in their exercise books
steps.knowledge: - Name of the trees in their communities
steps.value: Wonder/curiosity to help learners pay attention to their surroundings
steps.skills: - Identifying the various trees in their communities
steps.output: - A list of at least three names of trees in his/her community
steps.assessment_criteria: - Checking the list of three names of trees in the community the learner comes from
